prod_short_desc: Grab a battle suit and help Aaron defend Knighton!
prod_long_desc:
Become a bigger hero with the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Battle Suit Aaron play set, featuring a buildable battle suit with posable limbs, minifigure cockpit, Blazer Bow with spring-loaded shooters, giant fist and a Combo NEXO POWER shield. Includes five scannable shields for NEXO POWERS that provide unique battle skills in the digital game and a new-for-spring-2017 Aaron minifigure.
Includes a new-for-spring-2017 Aaron minifigure.
Features a buildable battle suit with highly posable limbs and a minifigure cockpit.
Also includes a buildable Blazer Bow with dual spring-loaded shooters.
Accessory elements include a Combo NEXO POWER shield and five scannable NEXO Powers.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' permission.
Scan shields for each of the five NEXO Powers (Orbital Strike, Spirit Fox, Dropthe Beat, Incinerate and Magnetize) and create your own combinations to power up and defeat the Stone monsters in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Combine with vehicles in other LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to enhance the battle suit with futuristic functions!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
Stands over 3” tall.
